parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clockspring can cause the airbag system to malfunction, leading to the failure of airbags to deploy in the event of an accident, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: The airbag warning light comes on
the horn is inoperable
an abnormal clicking sound is heard in the steering wheel while turning
electric buttons on the steering wheel fail to operate without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the airbag system can cause airbags to fail to deploy in the event of an accident, leading to serious injury or death.
symptoms: The airbag warning light comes on
the airbag does not deploy in the event of an accident
the dashboard displays "SRS Malfunction Service Requested" light.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system in the steering wheel can cause the airbag system to malfunction, leading to the failure of airbags to deploy in the event of an accident, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: An abnormal clicking sound is heard in the steering wheel while turning
electric buttons on the steering wheel fail to operate without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle can move unexpectedly, either forward or backward, without the driver's input, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle switches into park while driving
loses power
and comes to a complete stop; the vehicle rolls backward or drives in reverse while in drive
without operator control; the vehicle accelerates or decelerates unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the TCM can cause the vehicle to malfunction, leading to unexpected movements, loss of power, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to regain acceleration
the "See the Driver's Manual" message appears on the dashboard
the vehicle accelerates or decelerates unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaw in the automatic transmission can cause the vehicle to roll backward or drive in reverse while in drive, without operator control, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle rolls backward or drives in reverse while in drive
without operator control
the vehicle accelerates or decelerates unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical System Failure Causing ABS and Power Steering Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the ABS and power steering systems to malfunction, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: ABS INOPERABLE warning message appears on the cluster
ABS and traction control lights illuminate
loss of power steering
difficulty steering
slow acceleration
and near accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Repair and Recall Service by Dealership
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of dealerships to properly repair and communicate with customers regarding recalls can lead to prolonged exposure to safety risks, causing frustration and mistrust among customers.
symptoms: Difficulty scheduling appointments
lack of loaner cars
unclear repair timelines
and poor communication from dealerships.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning ecostart system can cause the engine to shut off unexpectedly, leading to a loss of vehicle control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The engine shuts off at a red light
loud popping noise when attempting to accelerate
"Do not shift gears. See dealership" message appears
and the car requires manual restart.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the navigation screen can reduce visibility and increase the risk of accidents, especially when reversing.
symptoms: The navigation screen goes black when the vehicle is put in reverse.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning door locking system can trap occupants inside the vehicle, especially in emergency situations, and increase the risk of injury or death.
symptoms: The door will not open when the lever is pulled unless the door is manually unlocked
requiring occupants to remember to unlock the door before exiting.
